channel.title: Slayer music/sound
channel.description:
does anyone have this? http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/File:Slayer_task.ogg
i can loop through the music/sounds, but first of all i don't know what it is. apparently it is also slayer level up sound under lvl 50 in rs
what is this? is this a sound or a music, i wonder. im guessing it is a sound but i do not want to waste my time to find nothing
if no one knows it i guess ill go try to find it my self
edit:
There you go, it was actually a lot easier then i first thought.
player.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(61); //level up player.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(62); //slayer task complete player.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(90); //oh dear you are dead
Due to my boredom, i decided to correct the level up sounds
if anyone wants:
public static final int[] SKILL_LEVEL_UP_MUSIC_EFFECTS = { 30, 38, 66, 48, 58, 56, 52, 34, 70, 44, 42, 40, 36, 64, 54, 46, 28, 68, 61, 10, 60, 50, 32, 301, 417 };
100% correct according to wikia, took me a little while to find all of them

item.title: Slayer music/sound
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I’m also going to say sound because the Wikia does not specify it as a music selection, but as a short jingle.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer music/sound
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Flame_:

And it would be longer than 5 seconds.

Yea i thought that my self too, but you never know. i’ve heard 1min long sounds

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer music/sound
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

does anyone have this? http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/File:Slayer_task.ogg

i can loop through the music/sounds, but first of all i don’t know what it is.
apparently it is also slayer level up sound under lvl 50 in rs

what is this? is this a sound or a music, i wonder. im guessing it is a sound but i do not want to waste my time to find nothing

if no one knows it i guess ill go try to find it my self

edit:

There you go, it was actually a lot easier then i first thought.

player.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(61); //level up
player.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(62); //slayer task complete
player.getPackets().sendMusicEffect(90); //oh dear you are dead

Due to my boredom, i decided to correct the level up sounds

if anyone wants:

public static final int[] SKILL_LEVEL_UP_MUSIC_EFFECTS = { 30, 38, 66, 48,
58, 56, 52, 34, 70, 44, 42, 40, 36, 64, 54, 46, 28, 68, 61, 10, 60,
50, 32, 301, 417 };

100% correct according to wikia, took me a little while to find all of them

Read full topic
